Previous: kuNext: kuñc

√kuc 'shrink, curl'

present: [1.] kuñcate etc.   -- [6.] kucati etc.  

perfect: cukoca  cukuñca  

[aorist: akocīt  akuñcīt  kociṣyati  kuñciṣyati  kocitā  kuñcitā  ]

verbal: kucita E.+  kuñcita E.+  

secondary: passive: kucyate   -- intensive: cokucya-   -- desiderative: cukuñciṣa-   -- causative: kuñcayati etc. E.+  kocayati etc. E.+  

derivatives: kuca E.+  -kucana C.  -kuñcaka C.  kuñcana C.  kuñci C.  koca E.+  -kocaka C.  -kocin C.  -kocana E.+  

Given by the grammarians as two distinct roots, and not without some justification.
